questions.question_text: Which AWS Cloud design principle does a company follow by using AWS CloudTrail?

discussion.content: This is only question I can get on examtopics which I received in the paper

Selected Answer: D
Answer D: Ensure traceability

"AWS CloudTrail is an AWS service that helps you enable operational and risk auditing, governance, and compliance of your AWS account. Actions taken by a user, role, or an AWS service are recorded as events in CloudTrail."

(see: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/awscloudtrail/latest/userguide/cloudtrail-user-guide.html)

Selected Answer: D
I think D is the right answer.

Selected Answer: B

questions.question_text:
A company has an AWS-hosted website located behind an Application Load Balancer. The company wants to safeguard the website from SQL injection or cross-site scripting.

Which AWS service should the company use?

discussion.content:
the question about compute services. The answer is B, Amazon EC2.

Amazon EC2 is a compute service that allows you to launch virtual machines (VMs) on AWS. It offers a variety of features, including automatic scaling. Automatic scaling allows you to automatically increase or decrease the number of EC2 instances that are running based on demand. This can help you to optimize your costs and ensure that your application is always available.

The other services listed do not offer automatic scaling.

Amazon SQS is a message queuing service that allows you to decouple applications and processes.
Amazon Aurora is a relational database service that is based on MySQL and PostgreSQL.
AWS Lambda is a serverless compute service that allows you to run code without provisioning or managing servers.
I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Selected Answer: B
https://aws.amazon.com/autoscaling/

Question about compute service , Lambda is serverless computing.

Selected Answer: D
AWS Lambda automatically scales resources up or down to meet application workload demands.

Selected Answer: D
Lambda automatically handles scaling the number of execution environments until you reach your account's concurrency limit.

Selected Answer: D
https://aws.amazon.com/lambda/

Execute code at the capacity you need, as you need it. Scale to match your data volume automatically.

Selected Answer: D
AWS Lambda automatically scales resources up or down to meet application workload demands.

Option A, Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS), is a fully managed message queuing service that enables you to decouple and scale microservices, distributed systems, and serverless applications.

questions.question_text: Which AWS compute service automatically scales resources up or down to meet application workload demands?
What is the MOST secure way to store passwords on AWS?

choices.A: Store passwords in an Amazon S3 bucket.
choices.C: Store passwords in AWS Storage Gateway.
choices.D: Store passwords in AWS Secrets Manager.
choices.B: Store passwords as AWS CloudFormation parameters.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
AWS Secrets Manager

choices.A: Transfer data to AWS by using AWS Snowball.
choices.C: Set up a VPN connection between the data center and an AWS Region.
choices.B: Transfer data to AWS by using AWS Storage Gateway.
choices.D: Set up an AWS Direct Connect connection between the company network and AWS.

questions.question_text:
A company wants to set up a high-speed connection between its data center and its applications that run on AWS. The company must not transfer data over the internet.

Which action should the company take to meet these requirements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
By setting up an AWS Direct Connect connection, the company can establish a private network link between their data center and AWS infrastructure. This connection provides a dedicated pathway for data traffic, enabling the company to achieve high-speed and consistent performance between their on-premises environment and applications running on AWS.

Selected Answer: D
To meet the requirement of setting up a high-speed connection between a company's data center and its applications running on AWS without transferring data over the internet, the company should set up an AWS Direct Connect connection between the company network and AWS. Therefore, the correct option is D.
